name: Create a new listing on Etsy when a new card is created on Trello
description: Every time a new card is created on Trello, Make will automatically create a new listing on Etsy. This example uses the description of the card to add the values of the "description" ,"price" , and "quantity" in the listing. To use this example you need to enter the description of the Trello card in a certain format separated by ",". This is the format used "Description, Price, Quantity".
